circularity_acknowledgment.issue: Compositionality test uses VP shuffles which are confounded by spacer composition
circularity_acknowledgment.implication: If spacer confound inflates GSI, it also inflates non-compositionality
circularity_acknowledgment.mitigation: Results should be interpreted as upper bound on non-compositionality
circularity_acknowledgment.recommendation: Future work should use spacer-controlled compositionality tests
